input.job_description:
Shahan Ahmad  
shahanahmad.sa@gmail.com  | +923335216195  
                               LinkedIn Profile:  http://linkedin.com/in/shahan -ahmad -221b3b78  
 
 
 
 
Professional Summary  
Goal oriented professional with experience spanning  across  international and local trade finance  to relationship and project 
management seeking to further enhance my career within technology, digital inclusion and  financial sector . 
 
Work Experience  
 
Relationship Management | Digital Financial Inclusion | Project Management | Cash Management | Product Development - Planning  
 
United Bank Limited (UBL)  February  2017 – Present  
Sr. Relationship Manager  (AVP)  – Financial Institutions Department  
 Managing cash management and Product implementation of North region business po rtfolio of approximately PKR 300  Billion for 
Non -Banking Financial Institutions majorly Waseela bank, U bank, Tameer  bank, khushhali bank and ZTBL.   
 Monitoring Bank to Bank business related to all trade transactions responsible for bank guarantee portfolio of approximately PKR 
9 Billion . 
 Leading client management across project s related guarantees for CPEC and Non -CPEC customers . 
 Managing proactive relationship management for clients across industries including likes of ZTE, Huawei, SinoHydro, Powerchin a, 
SinoTec, CRCC, Harbin Ele ctric, Xinjiang Road and Bridge, CRBC, China Ghzouba, CCECC, COPHC, China Petroleum Pipeline Bureau, 
China Three Gorges and agents of foreign companies Like Marubeni, Maxus Power, MCC, Kestral Trading, Raviana, Atecs, Sino 
Trans Logistics, Asean Internatio nal, ALIT, CMEC, Poly technologies, CETC based in Pakistan . 
 Major Highlights:  Conducted overall structuring, financial analysis and management of projects including Safe City Project, Suki -
Kinari  Project, Port Qasim Power Plant Project, New Islamabad Airport construction project, Pak -Qatar LNG project, Kohala Hydro 
Power Project, Tarbela -4 project . 
 Led and Implemented the following Key Digital S olutions  and P rojects  for various clients:  
1.  R5 proje ct of Jazz involving product, IT digital and Finance team providing un -interrupted VPN services of API for jazz cash   
retailers and franchisees .  
2.  Successfully closed project mandate for Khushhali Bank`s borrowers direct deposit on UBL counters.  
3.  Success fully implemented project of VPN API services for Telenor Bank for collection and disbursement of funds.  
4.  Currently working for onboarding PMN`s Munsalik Portal for providing digital solutions through UBL for cash management 
of MFPs. Digital inclusion of one link project for Munsalik where in UBL will be settling bank.  
5.  Currently working on high scope project, app -to-Wallet  integration between Jazz and UBL which is a pioneering digital 
product initiated by UBL.  
6.  Currently working on integration of SECP on line portal with UBL system for updating of documents related to company 
registration, a requirement by the bank during the process of account opening. ( API Based ) 
 
 
MCB Bank Limited      September 2015 – January 2017  
Assistant Manager – Trade Finance Department  
 Managing Corporate and Government sector clients responsible for trade portfolio of approximately PKR 4 Billion.  
 Ensuring timely and accurate Issuance and Payments of Import Letter of Credit (L/C) for key clients  
 Handling Export Transactions ser vices for the department across various projects  
 Developing and handling encashment of foreign Letter of Guarantees (L/G)  
 
United Bank Limited (UBL)  September 2013 – August 2015  
Imports Incharge  – Trade Finance Department  
 Managing payment portfolio of PKR 2.5 Billion ensuring corporate transactio ns for clients across industries including Telecom, Oil 
& Gas and Construction  
 Ensuring timely and accurate reporting of clients import  activities to SBP on a monthly basis  
 Leading treasury rate negotiations to ensu re highest revenue for the bank  
 
Habib Bank Limited (HBL)  December 2007 – August 2013  
Imports Trade Officer – Trade Department  
 Liaising across key departments to ensure timely transaction approvals for clients  
 Responsible for FE allocation/financial approv als from SBP for establishment of Import Letter of Credits for Public Sector clients  
 Developing and retiring import contracts and L/Cs following thorough review of import documents including foreign and local 
documents and Lodgment/Retirement so all requir ements are met  
 Monitoring market and financial indicators (like FOREX) on a regular basis to ensure spot and forward cover from treasury to 
ensure effective payments from corporate clients  
 
 
 
 
 
 
MAX Telecom      July 2005 – July 2007  
Customer Relations Manager  
 
 Managing and handling client queries, requests, orders and complaints including  Legal Complaints (TIO -Tele -communication 
Industry of Ombudsman) to ensure highest level of customer satisfaction is met  
 Quarterly reviews of the processes to plan and implement any process improvement through recurrent trainings and change 
in strategy.  
 Liaising and managing business with an Australian services provider Telstra . 
 Leading sales team by ensuring performance gaps are met through regular statistics and analys is. 
 
 
Education  
 
SZABIST, Islamabad     May 2004  – June 2005  
Masters in Business Administration (E -MBA)  
 
Punjab University, Lahore  May  2002  – June 2004 
Bachelors of Arts – Sociology, Statistics and English  
 
Trainings  & Workshops  
 Global Trade Finance Workshop    Karachi, May 2018  
3 days workshop on Trade Finance product sales and marketing conducted by International Finance Cooperation (World Bank)  
 Basic Banking Training & Banking Operations   Islamabad, 2008  
 Four months extensive, classroom followed by on the job rotational training HBL Management Development Institute (MDI)  
 Project Management:  
Ongoing  project management certification in order to add the same against the skill set.  
 
Skills , Interest s & Personal Strengths  
 Proficient with MS computer systems and software’s.  
 Risk Management, Budgeting.  
 Expertise with key Banking software including SWIFT, MISYS, Symbols and TI  
 Project management.  
 Stakeholder Engagement & Management.  
 Planning and forecasting . 
 Strong interpersonal / communication / Conflict resolution / Problem solving / Crisis Manage ment skills.  
 Strong convincing power, innovative and ability to work in multi -cultural teams.
input.additional_info: [Fictional Company] values candidates from top-tier universities such as [University A] and [University B]. We support diversity and inclusion in our hiring processes. Relocation assistance is provided on a case-by-case basis. We assess skills through a combination of technical interviews, case studies, and practical tests to ensure the candidate’s fitment with the organizational culture and job requirements.
minimum_requirements: Strong understanding of sales processes and negotiation skills
